Precious remained unconscious and on a ventilator for a week after the birth. "Do you think she's going to make it?" her mother came to Dr. Byer‚Äôs office to ask. "Please be real with me."

In the end, the doctors all agreed: Neither mother nor child was getting enough oxygen. Their best chance to save both was to deliver ‚Äî right away.

Feb. 14

Feb. 12

Feb. 4
